bad_n = np.array([2])
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    gsp.nearest_neighbors(self.centres, n=bad_n, kind=self.kind)
bad_n = -5
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    gsp.nearest_neighbors(self.centres, n=bad_n, kind=self.kind)
bad_n = 10 ** 10
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    gsp.nearest_neighbors(self.centres, n=bad_n, kind=self.kind)
